amesmarket

Interface ILoadProfileCollectionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLPCProvider

    public interface ILoadProfileCollectionProvider
    Defines an interface to provide load scenarios to AMES. Defined as an interface to make it possible to have different types of load scenario providers. (e.g. one provides a 'different' true load scenario than any of the scenarios there were actually defined in the LoadCase control.)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Select one of the scenarios as the 'true' load.

      • getActualScenario

        LoadProfileCollection getActualScenario()
                                 throws AMESMarketException
        Get the LoadScenario that was marked as the actual scenario. pre: determineActualScenario(Random) has been called, #initializeFromControlFile(File) has been called.
        Returns:
        the LoadScenario to use as the 'actual' LoadProfile data.
        Throws:
        BadDataFileFormatException
        AMESMarketException

      • getExpectedLoadProfiles

        LoadProfileCollection getExpectedLoadProfiles()
                                       throws BadDataFileFormatException
        Get the load scenario that is 'expected' as opposed to the one that actually happens. LSE's use this information for forecasting load.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        BadDataFileFormatException

      • determineActualScenario

        void determineActualScenario(java.util.Random random)
        Select one of the scenarios as the 'true' load.
        Parameters:
        random - number generator to use.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid scenario number.

      • scaleLoadProfileCollections

        void scaleLoadProfileCollections(double maxGenCap,
                                 double capMargin)
                          throws BadDataFileFormatException
        Adjust the loads in the scenarios to be a certain margin below the generation capacity.
        Parameters:
        maxGenCap -
        capMargin - as decimal representation of the percentage. e.g. 0.15 not 15%. between -1 and 1.
        Throws:
        BadDataFileFormatException

      • getLoadCaseControl

        LoadCaseControl getLoadCaseControl()
        Returns:
        The object representing the 'control' information for the load case.
